programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba relies on old evidence, and faces off against a former colleague, during the trial of child abductor Lewis Hodda.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An old kidnapping case is reopened when a young woman is found wandering in Central Park; Carisi's conversation with a reporter puts him in hot water.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a sexual assault investigation is stalled for months, a woman puts her accusations against a popular athlete on a billboard.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry faces one final threat, and one that forces him to use more than just his alien strength.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a stranger assaults an FBI agent (Marcia Gay Harden), she asks Benson to have her rape kit tested; the agent refuses to talk about the incident, fearing she will be pulled off the case she is working.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A popular sports reporter (Lauren Cohan) accuses a cameraman (David Marciano) of rape and stalking; when the victim learns she is pregnant as a result of the rape, the defense employs controversial tactics in hope of gaining favor with the jury.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The trial of an accused child molester is jeopardized when the prime witness has difficulty dealing with his past.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler hunt for the fiend who raped and impregnated a comatose patient; the trail leads them to a doctor (Bruce Davison) whose stem cell research is funded by a billionaire with Parkinson's disease.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths occur inside a traveling commune, starting an investigation that lasts more than a decade; two sisters -- former commune members -- reveal stories that involve lies, lust and greed.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths occur inside a traveling commune, starting an investigation that lasts more than a decade; two sisters -- former commune members -- reveal stories that involve lies, lust and greed.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: After a mission in Mexico, Callen, Sam and Kensi must find a way home with an unconscious Deeks in tow; Mosely and retired Navy Admiral Hollace Kilbride look for assistance with their missing colleagues.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: A prototype tactical assault suit is stolen from a Navy base and used in a jewelry heist; the team must determine who stole the suit and what their next target is; retired Navy Admiral Hollace Kilbride temporarily oversees the team.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: Callen and Sam are assigned protection duty for Deputy Crown Prince Kamal after an assassin targets his decoy upon arrival in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a stranger assaults an FBI agent (Marcia Gay Harden), she asks Benson to have her rape kit tested; the agent refuses to talk about the incident, fearing she will be pulled off the case she is working.

programme.desc: A popular sports reporter (Lauren Cohan) accuses a cameraman (David Marciano) of rape and stalking; when the victim learns she is pregnant as a result of the rape, the defense employs controversial tactics in hope of gaining favor with the jury.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The truth behind the alleged rape of a woman by her police officer husband comes to light when a history of domestic abuse is uncovered.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Benson goes into hiding to find justice for an abused housewife (Clea Duvall), uncovering a 34-year-old unsolved murder case in the process.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young female Marine goes missing as she is about to give birth to her rapist's child; Olivia struggles with painful flashbacks of her sexual assault.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A judge asks Benson and Stabler to ask a convicted serial killer about the location of his son's body.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a night of drinking, a man (Scott Foley) wakes up with a head injury and a dead woman in his bed; Detectives Benson and Stabler try to piece together the crime by returning to the bar where the night began.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a young boy is raped, detectives find out their suspect is the leader of a civil rights group that supports adult-child relationships.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The kidnapping of a young boy reminds Cragen, Munch and Benson of an unsolved case from 13 years earlier.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a rape victim is arrested for murder in Suffolk County, Detective Benson questions the case and finds enough evidence for District Attorney Barba to charge a different suspect in Manhattan.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The detectives go under cover to arrest a man who brutally attacks other men; a deceptively tough defense attorney (Nia Vardalos) complicates ADA Barba's case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A military officer who was gang raped refuses to cooperate with the SVU for fear of damage to her reputation; Amaro asks his ex to help dig up information on the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: After a teen uses a rifle to stop an assault on his mother, he learns the perpetrator of the assault is someone he knows.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation hits a nerve with Benson when a suspect claims his genetic makeup causes him to commit rape.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man is found castrated and left for dead, Rollins and Carisi uncover three female suspects who have possible motives; Langan gives devastating news to Benson.

programme.title: The Rainmaker
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at USA's new series, "The Rainmaker.".

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Rollins tries to help a friend press rape charges against her lover, she finds herself thrust into the middle of the case.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a man uses a false identity to lure a vulnerable married woman to bed, Barba thinks the evidence amounts to rape.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Several murder victims are found with a dollar bill pinned to their chests; Voight makes a discovery about a friend; a series of home invasions.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a bartender takes a bullet intended for Halstead, the bounty on him becomes more real; following a tense interaction, Platt and Nadia reach an understanding.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: The team races against the clock when two teenage girls disappear; Voight seeks honest answers from the father of one of the girls.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight is attacked and abducted while trying to help Olive; Roman and Burgess search for a girl who has taken off with a police badge.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Detective Voight shows up, looking to cash in the favor Dawson owes him; Casey's social life takes on a familiar pattern; Molly prepares for the grand opening of Dawson, Herrmann and Otis's bar; Severide faces a threat to his career.

programme.title: Chicago Fire

programme.desc: Casey struggles with his new responsibilities; Severide dreads the arsonist's next attack; Mouch starts campaigning; Dawson and Shay decide they need to get out more.
